attributes.action: Rejected takeover for Newcastle and it should be investigated by the government.
attributes.additional_details: Compare other bids and make sure the same levels of checks were completed The process should be the same and we believe the decision makers have be influenced and acted outside of UK and Welsh law in regards to the freedom to trade.
attributes.background: The Premier League has officially rejected a bid for Newcastle despite being offered overwhelming evidence in regards to proof of ownership. A willing buyer and seller means you must investigate the process and make sure it was even compared to other takeovers. Man Utd, Man City E.g.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for the Premier League and FA.
